projects.title: Extending Sleep No More
projects.description: a set of experimental digital portals connecting an immersive-theater audience member with an online spectator

projects.title: Cicadence
projects.description: an interactive soundscape created through a bio-mimetic process that is inspired by the auditory experience produced by the cicada

links.text: Chroma District in the Arts at MIT website

projects.title: SoundStrand
projects.description: a music composition toy, which comprises a set of building blocks, each containing a musical motif. The blocks can be connected to each other to create a musical theme. They can also be manipulated with three degrees of freedom: elongation changes the rhythmic distribution of the notes; bending changes the direction of the melody; and twisting changes the harmonic context
